text: Interesting decision to stop this study. Higher dose #chloroquine associated with prolonged QT intervals and possibly increased mortality in #COVID19. However, >75y.o. only recruited to high dose arm. Sadly numbers too small for outcome assessment. Thx @HSharma52509909 https://t.co/HsYxYHbcTZ https://t.co/sAJWuFQRfY
